Review Text:
One of the best burritos according to me!

Review Text:

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Delicious, generously sized burritos with excellent hot sauces, served by the nicest guys in Amsterdam. Excellent place for vegan & veg options because they are super attentive. ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Was attending a class near here and happened by it. I missed good Mexican food, and was bought I‚Äôd give this a go. Wow! Was it amazing. Best burrito I‚Äôve had in the Netherlands! The amount you get for what you pay is also awesome. Great place, friendly staff, I‚Äôll be back!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Truly, what made the experience exquisite was my food guide Thomas who has made me one darn good burrito and now a loyal customer.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Great burritos. Having lived in Mexico for 3 yrs, these have a good authentic Mexican taste. Place is basic bit nice. Nice and helpful and helpful. Really nice scenery with windmill outside. Good and filling. Not the cheapest place (burrito about ‚Ç¨10), but just soooo good.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Me and my partner visited here based on the reviews and it was the best burrito ever. The staff were lovely and it had lots of families in and out too. Would recommend to anyone visiting Amsterdam to check this place out.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! Really tasty, quick and the portions are giant. I had chicken, bacon and avocado for ‚Ç¨12, had amazing experience eating it and was full for the rest of the day. Also, had a nice chat and a few laughs with a guy on a ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: AMAZING BURRITOS! I had to have dinner in 10 minutes because of an appointment and the guy accepted the challenge of making a burrito in 5, and did it in 3 minutes... and it was so good!! Definitely coming back for a more quiet dinner to enjoy it to the fullest, loved itüòç

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Super friendly staff with delicious food! Great salsa

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: great place to get boritos. I ate mine on the spot .. (large enough to replace dinner) overlooking the friendly staff doing their work. great view of the haarlemmerplein commuting traffic which is chaotic full of bikes.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: The shop looks really rustic, the decoration is on point! The staff is pleasant and friendly too. But the burritos... the burritos are AMAZING! Definitely pay this place a visit if you're in the area.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: I love this place! They have a real Cali burrito that any American would be happy to have. The staff is super friendly, always remembers us, and gives us a friendly chat each time. The location is very convenient, they deliver, and there's a little seating with a decent view.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Best burritos in town, no contest! Staff is always friendly and smiling people. Tiny spot, not really for sitting down properly, but the food and service is exemplary. Can‚Äôt recommend enough!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text:
I asked for no spicy but I still cried ü•µüå∂Ô∏èüî•

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: They make the best burritos in the neighborhood. It's so much better than other burrito places like Salsa shop. ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: This place has a REAL California Burrito!! In case you‚Äôre not familiar, that‚Äôs a special version of a burrito that is similar to carne asada and has guacamole, sour cream, cheese, and fries INSIDE! Soooo delicious. Best burritos I‚Äôve had in ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Extremely delicious‚Ä¶This is what I‚Äôve been looking for in Amsterdam. Friendly service, fresh ingredients and healthy portions üëåüèº ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: I would have taken a picture of my burrito, but it was too good to let sit!  The people there work here are the best part!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: The best burritos in Amsterdam! The portions are big and fill you like a proper meal should do. Good ingredients, spices and flavours. The burritos are made in a cosy store by friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: I'm a pretty big dude (6'1 and 190lbs) and I can proudly say that one of their burritos was able to fill me up after walking for 5 hours around Amsterdam and having a small breakfast.The burrito was big (like really big), their ingredients ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: The best Mexican food I've found so far in Amsterdam.  The vegetarian burrito was definitely better than the chicken, but the big chunks of tomato were a little weird.  The guac was good, but no option to add it to the burritos!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text:
Without a doubt,  the best burritos in Amsterdam. The jewel in the crown of the Haarlemmerplein, they offer fast service and an excellent meal.
And I heard rumor of autumn and American Thanksgiving burritos.....Check them out!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text:
Quick, quality wraps with lots of ingredient choices. Friendly native English speaking service. But expensive; EUR 11-14 per piece including VAT, but excluding drinks and fries. Only take-out.
They respect Covid19 rules by standard measures

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Burritos and tacos are very good and the guy who makes them is cool!

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: This was our first time there. I had the veggie burrito bowl and my friends had the veggie burrito and the chicken, bacon avocado burrito all with the chipotle salsa (spicy, but delicious). We also ordered chips and guac. The food was ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Burrito done by men, whatever that mean üòÇ. Probably the biggest size I've tasted. The place cannot take a big crowd to feed but those who do will know what is a burrito and come back if burrito is their thing. I like their style and sometimes you can drop a joke with some of the cooks. I like a place that makes me feel like home.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Beautiful staff nice service  and tasty food

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Why can't Amsterdam do burritos?! I've been here 3 times because it's close to my house, but each time it's been pretty disappointing. Everything looks pretty fresh, but every burrito I've tried is incredibly bland. They put a ton of cheese the burritos but it tastes like nothing.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Friendly staff and really good quality ..

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Nice location in the western corner of center Amsterdam. Best Guacamole and salsas in town. Chicken burrito with habanero salsa is amazing, All products are fresh and you see how your food is prepared. Very friendly staff and good service.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Amazing food and very good service

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Eric , the old guy , is the BEST burrito maker i've ever seen . He has some classy taste with salsa . ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Absolutely the best burrito's in Amsterdam. The Chipotle salsa is excellent (spicy, but not too much). I like the chicken best, but the pulled pork us a nice alternative. The quesadila's are excellent, too, but they take a while to prepare.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: I was really charmed by the packaging for my take-out vegetarian burrito (Jonathan Yve watch out!). Then enchanted by the nachos with sour cream that came with it. And the freshness of the ingredients and the melted cheese made it just a ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: 5 stars because what I got was very very tasty. Not sure for how long have they been doing this but I think they are doing really great, so good job! ‚Ä¶

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Best Burritos in Amsterdam, probably the Netherlands. Loads of sauce, properly spicy, filled with great ingredients. Amazing. Their beef bacon avocado is Devine

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text:
Great burrito...loved the taste, the level of spice great, generous portions, great staff....
Honestly, as good or better than burritos I've had in the US.  Btw...I had the beef burrito with house made salsa.

Name: The burrito maker
Review Text: Best burrito in Amsterdam. A little pricey, but totally worth it for fresh ingredients, great salsas, authentic flavor.
